name: Salt or Pepa
tag_list: online-tutoring, live-advice, e-learning, webcam, teach, learn
overview:
Saltorpepa is global community that allows to exchange yours skills and services via live video conference. Members can choose to trade without money (using grains of salt as a currency) or they can choose to get paid for sharing their expertise.

Find live advisors in Business, Finance, Education & tutoring, Computers & internet, Languages, Psycho, Spirituality & religion, Home & leisure.

Two possible means of payment

SalorPepa is not only original with the multiplicity of areas they offer, they are pioneer by offering two means of payment: Money, of course with Paypal, and also grains of Salt. The choice of two means of payment being a key aspect of the website, they decided to name it â€œSalt or Pepaâ€. In other words, they decided to make a pun: Â« Salt or Pepper / Salt or PayPal Â». - It is inspired by the LETS (Local Exchange Trading System).

  • When you accept Paypal, the billing is done by the minute and the advisor is free to set his own rate (between 0,1$ and 4$/minute)
  • When you accept grains of salt as a currency, the advisor is also free to set his own rate (1, 2 or 3 grains per minute). NB: the only possibility to get grains of salt is to give an advice on the platform. They cannot be sold or bought.

A powerful webconferencing solution

The web conferencing window opens with a single click (no installation needed). Advisors can share presentations (PDF, Word and PowerPoint documents) and both advisor and caller can make annotations (text, draw, geometrical shape), web page co-browsing, share whiteboard and screen, and last but not least record and playback meetings.
